requirements: Enrollment limited to majors in Biomedical Engineering, except by permission of the director of undergraduate studies.
description:
Introduction to laboratory techniques and tools used in biomedical engineering for physiological measurement. Topics include bioelectric measurement, signal processing, and dialysis.
Enrollment limited to majors in Biomedical Engineering, except by permission of the director of undergraduate studies.

0.5 Yale College course credits
title: Physiological Systems Laboratory
